issue.title: [Rust] Activate several IPC integration tests for rust
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16636](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16636). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
arrow-rs has fixed severals integration test failures:

generate_decimal128_case
generate_interval_case
generate_map_case
generate_non_canonical_map_case
generate_nested_large_offsets_case
generate_nested_dictionary_case
generate_unions_case

And this one passes test without any fix:
generate_extension_case

We should activate these IPC integration tests for rust.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16636?focusedCommentId=17553073) by Andrew Lamb (alamb):*
Issue resolved by pull request 13219
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/13219>
